mapper.sql: order_no, type, apply_amount, actual_amount, client_id, status, document_url, audit_remark, audit_time, approve_time, created_at, updated_at
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from pms_orders
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into pms_orders
order_no,
type,
apply_amount,
actual_amount,
client_id,
status,
document_url,
audit_remark,
audit_time,
approve_time,
created_at,
updated_at,
#{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{documentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update pms_orders
order_no = #{record.orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_amount = #{record.applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
actual_amount = #{record.actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
client_id = #{record.clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
document_url = #{record.documentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_remark = #{record.auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{record.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve_time = #{record.approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_at = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update pms_orders set order_no = #{record.orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_amount = #{record.applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, actual_amount = #{record.actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, client_id = #{record.clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, document_url = #{record.documentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_remark = #{record.auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{record.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_time = #{record.approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update pms_orders
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_amount = #{applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
document_url = #{documentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_remark = #{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR}

update pms_orders set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_amount = #{applyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, document_url = #{documentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_remark = #{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from pms_client pc left join pms_orders pclr on pc.id=pclr.client_id
and pc.name = CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and pc.id_number = CONCAT('%', #{idNumber}, '%')
and pc.telephone = CONCAT('%', #{telephone}, '%')
and pclr.type = CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%')

select pc.id,pc.`name`, pclr.client_id, pc.id_number,pc.telephone,pc.address,pclr.type, pclr.apply_amount,pclr.`status` as recordStatus from pms_client pc left join pms_orders pclr on pc.id=pclr.client_id
and pc.name = CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and pc.id_number = CONCAT('%', #{idNumber}, '%')
and pc.telephone = CONCAT('%', #{telephone}, '%')
and pclr.type = CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%')
ORDER BY pc.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offSet}

select count(1) from pms_client pc left join pms_orders pclr on pc.id=pclr.client_id
and pc.name = CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and pc.id_number = CONCAT('%', #{idNumber}, '%')
and pc.telephone = CONCAT('%', #{telephone}, '%')
and pclr.type = CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%')

select pc.id,pc.`name`, pclr.order_no, pclr.client_id, pc.id_number,pc.telephone,pc.address,pclr.type, pclr.apply_amount,pclr.`status`, pclr.created_at,pclr.actual_amount, pclr.audit_time,pclr.approve_time,pclr.document_url from pms_client pc left join pms_orders pclr on pc.id=pclr.client_id
and pc.name = CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and pc.id_number = CONCAT('%', #{idNumber}, '%')
and pc.telephone = CONCAT('%', #{telephone}, '%')
and pclr.type = CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%')
ORDER BY pc.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offSet}
